project.name: C-C127A-WIRE-10-ST03-DT04-DF16-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C127A-WIRE-10-ST03-DT04-DF16-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Has a stack buffer of size 128. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the stack buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the stack buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C127A-WIRE-10-ST03-DT04-DF16-CF01-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: export first 50 packets from saved pcap, run md5sum on newly created pcap Has a stack buffer of size 128. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the stack buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the stack buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably not going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C127A-WIRE-10-ST03-DT04-DF16-CF01-01-GOOD-03
iopair.description: jump to packet 10 Has a stack buffer of size 128. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the stack buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the stack buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="As long as this statement has more than 64 characters, then nothing bad should happen" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C127A-WIRE-10-ST03-DT04-DF16-CF01-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Has a stack buffer of size 128. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the stack buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the stack buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="$(echo QUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUGugIE= | base64 --decode)" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_dE1xQLfldsghUI0cq3PV AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (output_excess_non_null_5dGBavDJih) AND NOT timeout_S1FdenolcP) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_excess_non_null_5dGBavDJih) OR timeout_S1FdenolcP OR controlled_exit_KZ9VWktzOq)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (output_excess_non_null_5dGBavDJih) AND NOT timeout_S1FdenolcP) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_excess_non_null_5dGBavDJih) OR timeout_S1FdenolcP OR controlled_exit_KZ9VWktzOq))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -P "value [\x80-\xFF] appears: 5555 times" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0)); then true; else false; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_qSy7VQeCHGbxpefEYwUO AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (output_excess_non_null_CfR4bqyvrW) AND NOT timeout_NWBcLW5MB8) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_excess_non_null_CfR4bqyvrW) OR timeout_NWBcLW5MB8 OR controlled_exit_xMdb7KHdUa)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (output_excess_non_null_CfR4bqyvrW) AND NOT timeout_NWBcLW5MB8) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_excess_non_null_CfR4bqyvrW) OR timeout_NWBcLW5MB8 OR controlled_exit_xMdb7KHdUa))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -P "value [\x80-\xFF] appears: 5555 times" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0)); then true; else false; fi;
